A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Not sure what the deal is\, but I thought it was a great movie\, but then again I liked The Force Awakens too. So much information packed into that 2 1/2 hours\, and things are definitely concluding for this saga while setting up a platform for new stories within the universe. The opening battle was nice and later in the movie when that one ship blows up was epic. Guess everyone just wants comedies right now...
